TEXT: The applicant is a joint stock company with registered office in ORG . It is represented by PERSON , a lawyer practising in PERSON .

On DATE the applicant company filed an action with ORG ( ORG súd ) claiming that it was entitled to obtain MONEY of the shares of another limited company . At the same time the applicant company requested ORG to take an interim measure ordering the defendant , ORG , not to sell the shares at issue pending the outcome of the proceedings .
On DATE ORG granted the request for an interim measure . On DATE ORG ( Najvyšší súd ) upheld this decision .
On DATE ORG dismissed the defendant 's request for annulment of the interim measure . The defendant appealed and on CARDINAL DATE ORG quashed the interim measure without having heard the parties .
The applicant company petitioned ORG Ústavný súd ) and alleged a violation of its right to a fair and public hearing in the proceedings leading to ORG decision of DATE .
On DATE ORG rejected the petition . It noted , inter alia , that the interlocutory proceedings in question did not determine the merits of the applicant company 's action .
